Package Brick.Break.Brick.CementBrick

Class CementBrickController

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.Brick.BrickController
Brick.Break.Brick.CementBrick.CementBrickController
public class CementBrickController
extends BrickController
This is the Controller of Model class(CementBrick Class) in CementBrick MVC design pattern This class extends from "BrickController" class.

      protected java.awt.Shape makeBrickFace​(java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      This method is used to create cement brick.
      Specified by:
      makeBrickFace in class BrickController
      Parameters:
      pos - This parameter is the position of the cement brick.
      size - This parameter is the size of the cement brick.
      Returns:
      new Rectangle(x,y,width,height)

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int dir)
      This method is to see if the cement brick have impact from the ball or not. If the cement brick have impact then the cement brick strength will be deducted by 1 and a crack will appear on the brick. If the cement brick have impact and the cement brick strength is 1, the brick strength will be deducted to 0 and the brick will break and no crack will appear.
      Overrides:
      setImpact in class BrickController
      Returns:
      either "true" or "false"

    • getBrick

      public java.awt.Shape getBrick()
      This getter method get the cement brick.
      Specified by:
      getBrick in class BrickController

    • updateBrick

      private void updateBrick()
      This method update the cement brick condition. If the brick have impact, this method will update the cement brick to show cracks.

    • repair

      public void repair()
      This method repair the cement brick to it original conditiona.
      Overrides:
      repair in class BrickController
